DOC.brief_summary: This phase 2 , randomize , open-label study compare safety , antiviral activity , pharmacokinetics HCV-796 administer combination peginterferon alfa 2B ( Peg-Intron ) plus concomitant Rebetol vs. Peg-Intron plus Rebetol Hepatitis C Virus ( HCV ) genotype 1-infected subject either naive treatment previously fail treatment ( non-responders ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluating Safety Clinical Activity HCV-796 Treatment-Naive Non-Responder Subjects
DOC.criteria: Infection HCV genotype 1 . HCV infected subject naive treatment . HCVinfected nonresponder subject . Women pregnant breastfeeding . ALT > / = 5X upper limit normal . AST > / = 5X upper limit normal .
